Invest

The Drive Your
Business Needs

Strengthen your base and expand your business globally with Cyberview.

Gateway To Southeast Asia

As one of the first founding 10 member states of the ASEAN community, Malaysia was selected to chair the 26th ASEAN Summit in 2015.

#1

Highest English proficiency in Asia

#3

Ranks 3rd as a global outsourcing destination

#5

Malaysia is able to develop, attract, and retain talent for companies

#12

Perceived well abroad through various competitive factors

#15

Top destination for international investors

#18

Also ranks 2nd in ASEAN as Malaysia’s regulatory environment is conducive for business

5000

Foreign companies from more than 40 countries have chosen Malaysia as a premium destination for business

Choose Cyberjaya

With these benefits at your disposal, it’s no wonder why Cyberjaya is the top choice of international investors.

Comprehensive list of financial and non-financial incentives, including 100% tax exemption for up to 10 years
Holistic and supportive ecosystem
Strategic location with excellent accessibility and connectivity
Home to the national communications and multimedia industry regulator and the national high technology champion
